subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Baseball
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: According to an executive in baseball familiar with the Mets’ plans, the team will not bring back Ramon Pena, a special assistant to General Manager Omar Minaya.
snippet: According to an executive in baseball familiar with the Mets’ plans, the team will not bring back Ramon Pena, a special assistant to General Manager Omar Minaya.
